aboutpara: I am a software engineer with over 5 years of experience. I am currently doing my BSc in CSE (3rd year) at United International University. I started my journey when I was in 8th grade and still going. I started as a front-end developer and then started Backend development and became a full-stack developer. I love to solve problems and turn ideas into reality!

resume.tagline: Senior Software Engineer | Typescript, NextJS, PostgreSQL
resume.description: Full-stack engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and developer platforms using TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and React. Proven track record leading cross-functional product development in distributed teams, with a recent focus on AI automation, developer tooling, and cloud-integrated systems. Adept at navigating ambiguity in startup environments and delivering impact through ownership, performance optimization, and collaboration

experiences.position: Technical Lead at Retreat | AI Development & Platform Infrastructure
experiences.bullets: Led the development of AI-driven backend systems, supporting product extensibility and automated content workflows.,Shaped backend strategy and architecture by collaborating directly with C-level executives to align with platform goals.

experiences.position: Software Engineer at Retreat | Platform Development & AI Integration
experiences.bullets: Designed and implemented backend automation features, reducing RFP response times by 40% through intelligent data workflows.,Spearheaded integrations of AI across the platform, aligning with long-term extensibility and content management goals.,Optimized CI/CD pipelines and system architecture to reduce deployment time and improve service reliability.

experiences.position: Lead Engineer at Syscomatic | SaaS & Mobile App Delivery
experiences.bullets: Directed frontend and backend teams to deliver scalable web and mobile products for early-stage startups.,Delivered extensible backend modules in Node.js/Express and refactored systems for improved performance.,Managed feature rollouts and performance tuning to support rapid iterations and product growth.

experiences.position: Full-Stack Developer at Freight Management Solution | Freight SaaS Platform
experiences.bullets: Engineered dispatch and load management systems with ExpressJS and MongoDB, improving logistics tracking.,Developed APIs for CRM, invoicing, and equipment tracking features tailored for multi-role collaboration.,Built a mobile driver application to interface with backend services in real time.
